references.paper_title: TensorFlow: Large-scale machine learning on heterogeneous systems
references.reason: This paper introduces TensorFlow, a crucial machine learning framework used extensively in the research, forming the foundation for many experiments.
This is a foundational paper in large language models (LLMs), the methodology of which is adapted for semantic routing.
This paper provides the classical approach to semantic routing, which is compared against the proposed learning-based approach.

references.paper_title: Hybrid computing using a neural network with dynamic external memory
references.reason: This work is an important early example of applying neural networks to large-scale graph problems, offering a relevant comparison to the proposed method.
This paper introduces the transformer network architecture, the foundation of the proposed autoregressive model for semantic routing.
